on reading compounds: 蓑笠【ミノカサ】sedge hat and straw rain cape
kun reading compounds: 笠【かさ】conical hat (East-Asian style), coolie hat, something shaped like a conical hat or an umbrella, shade (of a lamp), mushroom cap, pileus
笠石【かさいし】copestone, cope, coping stone, capping stone, capstone
嫁が笠【よめがかさ】Cellana toreuma (species of limpet)
煙突の笠【えんとつのかさ】chimney cap
